byline.original: By JAMES MacDONALD Special Cable to THE NEW YORK TIMES

abstract: Brit plane flies over Berlin and makes safe return
snippet: LONDON, March 1--In one of the most extensive reconnoitering expeditions since the war began, an undetermined number of Royal Air Force planes made bombless flights early this morning over German territory....

headline.main: NAZIS RAID CONVOY; SAY SHIPS WERE HIT; Several Sunk, Berlin Asserts --London Denies It--Planes Scout Wide German Area

lead_paragraph: LONDON, March 1--In one of the most extensive reconnoitering expeditions since the war began, an undetermined number of Royal Air Force planes made bombless flights early this morning over German territory.
